name: 3fc
description: Three Sided Football Club web app monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build -w @3fc/contracts && npm run build -w @3fc/api && npm run build -w @3fc/app
scripts.test: npm run build -w @3fc/contracts && npm run test --workspaces
scripts.contracts:check: npm run build -w @3fc/contracts && npm run test -w @3fc/contracts
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w @3fc/contracts && npm run typecheck --workspaces
